caption.p: Strategy for constructing PRV chimeric viruses. (A) Swapping of non-essential gene. Two sgRNAs were designed to guide Cas9 to cleave off a non-essential gene, and GFP was used for both positive and negative screening of recombinant virus. (B) Swapping of essential gene. To increase the rescue rate, Cas9 recognition sites within donor DNA were mutated synonymously to avoid cleavage by Cas9.
